product_name: Lib Tech La Nina MC C1 BTX Snowboard - 2013/2014
long_description: Inspired by La Nina weather patterns that bring heavy snowfall to the Northwest, the Lib Tech La Nina MC C1 BTX snowboard is built to take on steep, deep pow at high speeds. C1 BTX Banana Tech/camber put rocker between your feet and aggressive camber in the tail for control, pop and suspension; flat to mild camber up front for float and stability. Magne-Traction improves edge grip by adding seven contact points along the running length of the board, resulting in amazing control whether riding ice or pow. H Pop wood core is heat treated for sustained pop and performance; fiberglass enhances pop and maintains an even board flex. Birch internal sidewalls for added pop; external UHMW sidewalls stand up to wear and tear; bio-beans topsheet; sintered base is fast and low maintenance. .
short_description: Inspired by La Nina weather patterns that bring heavy snowfall to the Northwest, the Lib Tech La Nina MC C1 BTX snowboard is built to take on steep, deep pow at high speeds.
